subject: [Mhln] OEM Windows and Office Software - Question.
body:
I have learned more from my mistakes than from my successes.

Family is the most important thing in the world.

Where the apple reddens never pry -- lest we lose our Edens, Eve and I.

Nothing in the world is more haughty than a man of moderate capacity when once raised to power.

Nothing is so silly as the expression of a man who is being complimented.

Why should the devil have all the good tunes?

Decisiveness is a characteristic of high-performing men and women. Almost any decision is better than no decision at all.

Happiness is activity.

People don't change. Only their costumes do.

We come and cry and that is life, we cry and go and that is death.

When you blame others, you give up your power to change.

Civilization exists precisely so that there may be no masses but rather men alert enough never to constitute masses.

The test of a real comedian is whether you laugh at him before he opens his mouth.
